Suno.title: Suno AI Downloader
Suno.description: The fastest way to download Suno.ai MP3s.
Suno.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid Suno.com song URL
Suno.error: Failed to fetch song data. Please check the URL.

guide.title: How to use
guide.step1: Copy the song or playlist link from Suno.ai or Mureka.ai.
guide.step2: Paste it into the input box above and click 'Resolve'.
guide.step3: Click 'Download' in the results list to save the MP3.

AesCrypto.title: AES Encryption & Decryption
AesCrypto.description: Protect your sensitive data with military-grade AES-GCM encryption. All processing happens locally in your browser—your data never leaves your device.
AesCrypto.securityNote: This tool uses Web Crypto API (AES-GCM) with PBKDF2 for key derivation. Every encryption generates a unique Salt and IV.
AesCrypto.encryptError: Encryption failed. Please check your inputs.
AesCrypto.decryptError: Decryption failed. Incorrect password or corrupted data.

BusinessValidator.resWarning: This tool only checks format/checksum validity. It does not verify actual identity.

TorrentHistory.title: Torrent History Check
TorrentHistory.description: Scan your IP address for public torrent download history and security risks.
TorrentHistory.subtitle: See what traces your IP address has left on the public BitTorrent network. This tool queries public DHT databases.
TorrentHistory.notice: * We query public databases. No history is stored.

results.cleanDesc: We couldn't find any torrent activity associated with this IP address in the public databases.
results.cleanWarning: ⚠️ However, dynamic IPs change frequently, so check regularly.
results.vpnDetected: VPN usage detected! You are successfully hiding your location.
results.blockedDesc: Automated scan was blocked by security policy. Please check manually below.

analysis.subnetDesc: Simulated: Metadata queries indicate activity in compatible subnets.

guide.title: Privacy Protection Guide
whyVpnList: Hides your real IP address from public swarms.
Encrypts your traffic from ISP monitoring.
guide.policyDesc: This tool processes data in RAM only. No logs are saved. Your search history disappears when you close this tab.

disclaimer.title: Technical Limitations & Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This tool provides estimated data based on public P2P network DHT (Distributed Hash Table) information. Since most home internet connections (ISPs) use 'Dynamic IPs', the retrieved history might belong to a previous user of this IP address, not necessarily you. This result cannot be used as legal evidence and is for reference purposes only.

PortScanner.title: Port Scanner
PortScanner.description: Scan common ports on a target server to check for open services.
PortScanner.targetDesc: Enter a hostname or IP to scan common services
PortScanner.noScanDesc: Configure a target and press Start Scan to monitor port availability.

legend.openDesc: The service responded and the connection was accepted. This usually means an application is listening on this port.
legend.closedDesc: The host responded but explicitly refused the connection. No application is currently listening on this port.
legend.filteredDesc: No response was received within the timeout period. This is often caused by a firewall dropping the packets.

limitation.title: Note
limitation.content: This tool uses a server-side scanner to check port availability accurately.
